sentences.english: No dedicated radio resources are used in the URA Connected state.
sentences.chinese: 沒有專門的空口資源需要在URA連接狀態下使用。

sentences.english: And paid for learning with your empty praise.
sentences.chinese: 你們對學問的報酬只是空口讚美。

sentences.english: People know that you can't promise something for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 人們都知道不能空口說白話。

sentences.english: Of course, should not empty talk, there is truth must be proved.
sentences.chinese: 當然不能空口講白話，必須有事實加以證明。

sentences.english: Some people only pay lip service to gender equality.
sentences.chinese: 某些人主張兩性平等都只是空口說白話而已。

sentences.english: You think the jury will find him guilty, just on your say-so .
sentences.chinese: 你以爲你憑這樣空口一說，陪審團就會判他有罪。
